translation.en: -They've broken through the front lines! -I've lost contact with the capital!
translation.ja: 前線を突破された 交信不能

translation.en: [Bumblebee] Sorry I'm late. I hit a little traffic.
translation.ja: すまない　渋滞でね
ディセプティコン　攻撃せよ

translation.en: Autobots, fall back! Get to the tower!
translation.ja: オートボット　退却だ 発射台へ行け

translation.en: [Decepticon 3] Destroy the launch pad! Let none escape!
translation.ja: 発射台を破壊しろ １体も逃がすな

translation.en: [Optimus] Cybertron has fallen. Get to the escape pods.
translation.ja: サイバトロンは陥落した 脱出ポッドへ

translation.en: There are other Autobots scattered across the galaxy. We must reach them if we hope to survive.
translation.ja: 銀河の各地に仲間がいる 合流し 生き延びるのだ

translation.en: Optimus, this is our home. We have to fight for it.
We will fight on. But we must find refuge first.
translation.ja: 戦いは続けるが まずは身を隠さねば

translation.en: I found a planet that's well hidden. Earth.
translation.ja: 地球という目立たぬ星がある

translation.en: You will travel there and establish a base for us. Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
translation.ja: お前は そこに拠点を設けろ 我々は後から行く

translation.en: You must protect the planet. If the Decepticons find it, then our people are truly finished.
translation.ja: 敵から地球を守れ 見つかれば我々は滅びる

translation.en: Good luck, soldier. I'll buy you some time.
translation.ja: 幸運を祈るぞ 私が時間をかせぐ

translation.en: No! Ow! Ow! Ow! Okay, okay! I'm dead already, man!
translation.ja: おい　よせよ 俺はもう死んでるんだ

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, not just you. Being the overachiever that you are, you managed to get your whole squad killed, Danny.
translation.ja: お前がヘマしたせいで 隊が全滅だぞ　ダニー
ブラボー！ それ 痛いよ

translation.en: You know, I wouldn't know. I haven't been hit yet.
Ow! Okay, you know what? That's too close, man. -[soldiers laughing] -You could've taken out an eye.
translation.ja: 至近距離だと目が潰れちまう

translation.en: I got a date tonight, man. This ain't sexy!
translation.ja: 今夜 デートなんだ

translation.en: -That one was on me. -[yelping] That's a malfunctioning trigger.
translation.ja: すまないな 引き金の故障らしい

translation.en: This weapon is just faulty. Someone is going to get a talking to...
translation.ja: 銃を用意した奴に 文句 言わなきゃ

translation.en: Man, would you stop? All right, just stop.
translation.ja: よせよ　もう撃つな

translation.en: [sighs] I should've let you die in Grenada.
translation.ja: グレナダで助けたのに

translation.en: If you did, we wouldn't be able to come to the forest, run around and play these awesome games.
translation.ja: おかげで こうして遊べるんだ
お前が憎い ひどいぞ

translation.en: Wow, man, that hurts. 'Cause I love you.
But you refuse to let it in 'cause you got intimacy issues. A therapist will probably tell you you weren't hugged enough as a kid.
translation.ja: 他者を拒むのは 親の愛が足りなかったんだ

translation.en: -Look, man. -Danny, I know I look stupid, but...
I need medical up here now. We have a projectile strike in the northwest corner of the training course.
translation.ja: 医療班を頼む 訓練場の北西部が爆撃され⸺

translation.en: And would someone please explain to me why you dropped napalm on your own guys!
translation.ja: なぜ味方に ナパーム弾を落とすんだ？

translation.en: [soldier on radio] Negative. There are no live army drills in the northwest sector.
translation.ja: 北西部では 実弾演習をしていない

translation.en: What the hell hit us, then?
I need all of you to fan out and track that thing down now!
translation.ja: 散開し 全員で あれを追うんだ！

translation.en: Get down there now and flush that thing out!
translation.ja: 逃がすな　見つけろ

translation.en: [soldier 2 on radio] Target has been located, sir.
It's going for the mine! Cut it off!
translation.ja: 坑道に入るぞ　止めろ！
よせ　私は敵じゃない

translation.en: I don't want to hurt anyone.
Who called in the Air Force?
Did you think you could hide?
Now you'll die screaming. -Like your friends! -[both grunting]
translation.ja: 仲間と同じように死ね

translation.en: Tell me where your friends are hiding.
translation.ja: 仲間は どこに隠れた？

translation.en: as a member of the Autobot resistance, you are a traitor to Cybertron
translation.ja: オートボットの一員である お前は反逆者だ

translation.en: and are hereby sentenced to death.
translation.ja: その罪により 死刑を宣告する
やめて　くすぐらないで

translation.en: Wha-- Are those your diving trophies?
translation.ja: 飛び込み大会のトロフィー？

translation.en: Taking up too much space in my room.
Breakfast is conveniently located in the cupboards and the fridge.
translation.ja: ここに食器棚と冷蔵庫がある

translation.en: Since I'm such a big kid now, making my own breakfast and what have you.
translation.ja: もう大人なんだから 自分で作れ？

translation.en: You know how I could be an even bigger help around here, Mom?
translation.ja: もっと いろいろできるよ

translation.en: What do you know, it's my birthday tomorrow, perfect timing for a large cash gift.
translation.ja: 明日は私の誕生日よ お金ちょうだい

translation.en: You know, $500 is really all I need to finish the Corvette.
translation.ja: 500ドルで 車の修理が終わる

translation.en: I don't have $500. You know how much nurses make.
translation.ja: 私はナースよ 500ドルなんて無理

translation.en: "Half as much as doctors for twice the work," right?
Tell you what, kiddo... I got another job interview tomorrow. If all goes well, I'll have you swimming in car parts.
translation.ja: 俺が明日 就職できたら パーツを買ってやる

translation.en: Don't be rude. Feed the dog.
translation.ja: 失礼よ　犬にエサを

translation.en: Conan is Otis's dog. Make him do it.
translation.ja: コナンはオーティスの犬

translation.en: [Sally] Aw! You look so grown up in your karate suit.
translation.ja: 空手着だと大人に見える

translation.en: My baby boy is becoming a man.
translation.ja: すっかり一人前の男ね

translation.en: Oh, shoot, I'm gonna be late. Can you drop your brother at karate on your way to work, please?
translation.ja: 私は行くわ 弟を空手教室まで送って

translation.en: Um, I could if I had a car.
Just let him follow you on your bike so nobody abducts him.
translation.ja: 誘拐されないよう 原付で送って

translation.en: Abducts him? You just said he's a grown man now.
translation.ja: 誘拐？　もう大人なのに

translation.en: If anyone tries anything, I will rupture their freaking spleen.
translation.ja: 怪しい奴がいたら 脾臓を破裂させる

translation.en: All right. Have a good one. Eat safe. [chuckles]
Excuse me. Hi. We've never actually met...

translation.ja: 誰かさん　クビになる

translation.en: If I had to wear that, I would pray to be fired.
translation.ja: あんな制服じゃ クビの方がマシ

translation.en: ♪ A touch of sable In their eyes ♪
Are you still working on that damn car?
translation.ja: 今日も車のパーツ探しか

translation.en: You still working on that damn personality?
-What have you got for me? -Whatever you want.
translation.ja: パーツ入った？ 好きなのを選べ ソ連の核攻撃の前に

translation.en: Russians are gonna blow us all to hell anyway.
translation.ja: 好きなのを選べ ソ連の核攻撃の前に

translation.en: [Bill] Hey, kid. Hand me the three-eighths, would you?
translation.ja: チャーリー 3/8のレンチをくれ

translation.en: -You need the half-inch. -[Bill] I said the three...
translation.ja: なら これよ 違うって…
オプティマス･プライムは どこに？

translation.en: He survived the fall of Cybertron.
And no rebellion is truly dead until the leader is vanquished.
translation.ja: 反乱軍を滅ぼすには リーダーを殺さないと

translation.en: My name is Cliffjumper, lieutenant in the Autobot resistance.
translation.ja: 私はクリフジャンパー 反乱軍の隊長だ

translation.en: [Shatter] We know he's planning to establish a base. Tell us where it is and we'll let you live.
translation.ja: 彼が次の拠点に選んだ星を 教えれば命は助ける
私はクリフジャンパー…

translation.en: If you won't tell us where Prime is, perhaps your young friend will.
translation.ja: プライムの居場所は Ｂ-127から聞き出す

translation.en: You're a brave warrior. You deserve a better death.
translation.ja: お前は勇敢な戦士だ 立派に死なせたい

translation.en: I'll give you thirty bucks for all of it.
[chuckles] I can get twice that much for the coil alone.
translation.ja: コイルさえ その倍で売れる

translation.en: From who? I'm the only one that comes in here. I don't even know how you're still open.
translation.ja: 誰が買うの？ 客は私だけでしょ

translation.en: Just take it. Go. My show is on.
translation.ja: 持ってけ　番組が始まる

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that Beetle?
I swear to God, ever since they put up that dumbass tower, I can't get a signal to watch my shows.
translation.ja: 塔が建ってから テレビの電波が届かないんだ

translation.en: I've got to see what happens to Alf this week.
I can't do this without you. [sobbing]
[Alf on TV] Nice to meet you. Interested in a new Buick?
translation.ja: はじめまして 新車を買いません？

translation.en: [Kate on TV] Nice try. [Alf] All right, I touched. But I didn't eat.
[Kate] And I'm supposed to believe one of these steaks just got up and walked away on its own?
translation.ja: ステーキが勝手に 歩きだしたとでも？

translation.en: [Alf] But I'm starved! I've been fasting since lunch!
translation.ja: 腹ペコなんだ 昼から断食してる

translation.en: [Alf] Well, I did eat that pumpkin.
translation.ja: カボチャは食べたけど…

translation.en: I think it's too low, honey.
No. No, I think it goes to that button.
I don't know about... Fix it.
translation.ja: ちょっと変ね　結び直して
おはよう　誕生日だな

translation.en: I love you. Come on, open your present. I'm gonna be late for work.
translation.ja: さあ　プレゼントを開けて

translation.en: So, I keep hearing about people on mopeds getting run over and their brains smashed in.
translation.ja: 原付で事故を起こし 頭を潰される人が多い

translation.en: You got to wear this from now on. I don't care if it's not the law. It's our law.
translation.ja: 今後は必ず かぶって うちのルールよ

translation.en: Plus, look how cute it is.
I actually got you a little gift, too, Charlie.
translation.ja: 俺からもプレゼントが

translation.en: I mean, it's small, but, it's from the heart.
translation.ja: ささやかだけど 心を込めて

translation.en: A smile is a powerful thing.
It releases endorphins. It says to the world, "I'm fun and approachable."
translation.ja: 幸せホルモンが出て 外向的になれる

translation.en: You know, there's a whole chapter in here about how people who smile more often actually have more friends.
translation.ja: この本にも書いてある “よく笑う人は友達が多い”と

translation.en: I really think it's gonna change your whole outlook if you smile more often.
-What? -The yellow Beetle, I want it. I'll make you a deal. If I get that thing started, it's mine.
translation.ja: 黄色のよ 私が直せたらもらう

translation.en: That's no deal. That's just you taking my car.
translation.ja: ダメだ　私の車だぞ

translation.en: If I get it started, I keep it and I work here every day for a year!
translation.ja: くれるなら１年間 ここで毎日働く

translation.en: I'll scrub the grease off the floors, okay? I will pick up and organize every scrap of paper in this place.
translation.ja: 床の油をふき取ったり 書類の整理をしたり⸺

translation.en: I'll even detail your horrible, disgusting toilets.
translation.ja: おそろしく汚いトイレも 掃除する
お願い　誕生日なの
車はやる　誕生日おめでとう

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you!
translation.ja: ありがとう　ありがとう
ここのトイレはきれいだ

translation.en: Oh, my God, thank you so much! I love you!
translation.ja: ありがとう　愛してる

translation.en: That thing ain't even safe to drive.
Nothing! I'm fine. Mom, you should go back to bed.
Everything's fine. -What the hell is that? -Um, it's...
What is that car doing in our garage?
translation.ja: なぜ あんな車があるの？

translation.en: is my car. Uncle Hank gave it to me.
translation.ja: 私のよ ハンクおじさんがくれた

translation.en: I wish you would've told me before you brought it home.
translation.ja: 事前に話してほしかった

translation.en: Um, I'm in the middle of some stuff, Mom.
Okay, I'll get out of your hair, but...
translation.ja: いいわ　もう行くけど⸺

translation.en: Tell me things sometime. -I'm your mother. -Okay.
translation.ja: たまにはママにも 話をしてよね
走るの？ うん　ちゃんと走る

translation.en: Okay. A little jumpy. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 少しビビったわ　ごめん
チャーリー･ワトソン 18歳

translation.en: Today. Actually, it's my birthday today.
translation.ja: 今日は私の誕生日なの

translation.en: You don't know or you don't have a name?
You sound like a little bumblebee.
translation.ja: マルハナ蜂みたいな音

translation.en: I'm gonna call you that from now on.
translation.ja: これから そう呼ぶ

translation.en: ♪ All my exes live in Texas ♪
translation.ja: “ガズリンの ガソリンスタンド”

translation.en: -Come on, Amber. -Give me one good reason.
You tried to sleep with my sister!
Yeah, you're unsuccessful at everything. That down payment was for a house. You bought a car.
translation.ja: 何でも失敗するのね 家の頭金で車を買うし

translation.en: How stupid are you, Roy? We don't need a car. God!
translation.ja: あんたバカよ 車は要らないのに

translation.en: Now, just settle down for one second and hear me out.
translation.ja: 少し落ち着いて 俺の話を…

translation.en: Oh, God, Roy, that thing is coming right for us!
translation.ja: 大変よ こっちに飛んでくる

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no... Not my car. Not my car.
translation.ja: やめろ 俺の車に当たらないでくれ

translation.en: Please, God, no, not my car!
translation.ja: 頼む　俺の車はよせ！

translation.en: Oh, that's good, baby. That's good.
translation.ja: よかったな　ベイビー

translation.en: The indigenous life is even more primitive than I expected.
translation.ja: こんなに原始的な 生き物がいるとは

translation.en: Hmm. I like the way they pop.
B-127's distress signal came from the western coast of this continent.
translation.ja: Ｂ-127の救難信号は この大陸の西から発信された

translation.en: [Ron] When do they start letting you use nunchucks?
[Otis] I don't know, but I hope soon.
-Morning! See you guys later. -Where you off to so fast?
translation.ja: おはよう どこへ行く？

translation.en: -Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. -[car door closes]

translation.ja: ビー　どこ行ったの？

translation.en: No, have you seen my car today? It was in the garage. Someone stole it!
translation.ja: 今日 見てない？ 盗まれたみたいなの

translation.en: -[panting] -She had to bring Conan to the vet because he swallowed, like, a rubber glove or something and Ron needed the station wagon.
translation.ja: ゴム手袋をのみ込んだコナンを 獣医に連れてった

translation.en: Hi. Excuse me. It's me again.
translation.ja: やあ　また僕だよ 自己紹介を…

translation.en: -We never officially met, but... -I can't right now. Sorry.
translation.ja: やあ　また僕だよ 自己紹介を… 今はダメ　ごめん

translation.en: I know, buddy. Hang in there.
translation.ja: つらいのね　頑張って

translation.en: You can't eat everything you see. Just let this be a good life lesson for you.
translation.ja: 何でも食べるからよ これも いい教訓だわ

translation.en: Oh, my God. Stop it! Don't do that!
translation.ja: 何してんの ダメよ　やめて！

translation.en: Jesus! Charlie, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 驚いたわ　何してるの？

translation.en: -What the hell is going on? -Just pull the car over.
translation.ja: 何なの？ いいから止めて
はいはい　分かった

translation.en: Would you put that robot junk away? What are you thinking?
translation.ja: ロボットの腕は 引っ込めといてよ

translation.en: [Sally] You almost gave me a heart attack. I thought I was being carjacked. I'm taking the dog to the vet.
translation.ja: 強盗かと思ったわ 犬を獣医に連れてくの

translation.en: I can't believe you would take him without me.
Mom, I'm so worried about him! He's my dog, too, you know.
translation.ja: 心配なのよ 私の犬でもあるから

translation.en: What happened to Conan being Otis's dog?
translation.ja: いつもは オーティスの犬だと

translation.en: You should not be driving in such an emotional state. I know how you get during emergencies.
translation.ja: 緊急の時に 運転しちゃいけない

translation.en: Oh, okay. I'm happy for you to drive.
translation.ja: じゃ あなたが運転して

translation.en: You weren't wearing your helmet, by the way. -I saw that. -Oh, shoot.
translation.ja: ヘルメットを かぶってないわね

translation.en: Sir. I thought you'd want to see this immediately.
translation.ja: 至急これを見て下さい
確かか？ テキサスに２体が出現

translation.en: Two of them just made contact in Texas.
Intel says they're heading west fast.
[Charlie] Okay, Bee, we need to go over a few things.
translation.ja: ビー　あなたに話がある

translation.en: All right. [spits] I'm re-thinking the beach.
translation.ja: 砂浜は まずかった

translation.en: People can be terrible about things they don't understand.
translation.ja: 人は理解不能な物事を恐れる

translation.en: If they find you, they'll probably lock you up in a lab somewhere and cut you into tiny little pieces.
translation.ja: あなたが見つかれば ラボに監禁され分解される

translation.en: The only person you can show yourself around is me, okay?
translation.ja: 私以外には その姿を見せないで

translation.en: If you see anyone besides me, what do you do?

translation.ja: それでいい　元に戻って

translation.en: Okay, so let's say we're driving and all of a sudden...
translation.ja: それじゃ運転してる時に…

translation.en: Oh, shoot! Somebody's here! Hide, Bee, hide!
translation.ja: 誰か来たよ　隠れて！

translation.en: Bee, it's too late. You're already dead.
That's why we're practicing. You'll get it.
translation.ja: そのための練習よ 頑張って

translation.en: [pilot] Fox-2 on approach. Non-biologicals are inbound.
translation.ja: こちらフォックス２ 非生命体が接近中

translation.en: The goal, sir, should be to communicate with them.
translation.ja: 我々の目的は彼らと話すこと

translation.en: First contact with an alien species.
translation.ja: エイリアンと初めての接触だ

translation.en: I've spent my whole life waiting for this moment.
translation.ja: この時のために生きてきた

translation.en: If they make one wrong move, we put 'em down.
translation.ja: 変な動きをしたら攻撃する

translation.en: The humans are multiplying. Please let me kill them.
translation.ja: 地球人が大勢いる 殺しても？

translation.en: Not yet. B-127's signal has gone silent.
translation.ja: まだだ Ｂ-127の信号が消えた

translation.en: Listen up! I'm Agent Burns and this is... Dr. Powell.
translation.ja: 俺はバーンズ 彼はドクター･パウエル

translation.en: We currently have 100 guns pointed right at your head!
translation.ja: お前らに100丁の銃を向けてる

translation.en: we are Decepticon peacekeepers patrolling the galaxy.
translation.ja: 我々はディセプティコンの 平和維持部隊

translation.en: [Dropkick] What are you doing? This is humiliating.
translation.ja: 何やってる　屈辱的だぞ

translation.en: We believe a dangerous criminal from our world is hiding somewhere on yours.
translation.ja: 我々が追う危険な犯罪者が この星に隠れている

translation.en: How is it you think we can help?
You want access to our satellites?
[Shatter] Our scanners' range is limited. Your infrastructure is... primitive.
translation.ja: 我々のスキャン範囲は狭く 諸君の施設は原始的

translation.en: But combined, they could be quite powerful.
translation.ja: だが両方を合わせれば 強力になる

translation.en: No way! Out of the question!
We have a common enemy, Agent Burns.
translation.ja: 我々にとって共通の敵だ

translation.en: There's a war raging on our planet. If B-127 isn't found, that war may find its way here.
translation.ja: Ｂ-127を見つけないと この星に戦争が及ぶ恐れが

translation.en: We can find a way to help one another.
translation.ja: 助け合う道があるかも

translation.en: We'll talk it over with our superiors. In the meantime, if you could follow us.
translation.ja: 上層部と話すから 一緒に来てくれないか

translation.en: Very well, friend Powell. Take us to your leader.
translation.ja: 我が友パウエルよ リーダーに会わせてくれ

translation.en: [Charlie] Must suck being cooped up in a VW all day, huh?
translation.ja: 車になってると つらいでしょ

translation.en: Is there anyone that can help you? Do you have a family?
translation.ja: 助けてくれる仲間や 家族はいないの？

translation.en: You know, like a mom, dad, siblings? You all love each other?
translation.ja: あなたを愛してくれる 両親や兄弟は？

translation.en: Or drive each other crazy and you can't wait to get away and start a whole new life.
translation.ja: 仲が悪くて我慢できず 家出したの？

translation.en: Do you want me to see if I can fix it?
[Optimus distorted] B-127, I pray this message finds you.
translation.ja: Ｂ-127 お前に届くとよいが…
戦争は激しさを増している
ラヴィッジよ　行け！

translation.en: That voice said something about a-- a war.
translation.ja: 今の声は戦争が何とかって…

translation.en: Is the VW Beetle some kind off... disguise?
translation.ja: ビートルに変わるのは 一種の変装なの？

translation.en: It's okay. I think I can help.
-[John] And a criminal. -[Charlie] All right, I'm almost done.
[Charlie] No way. Are you actually watching it?
You can pop in another one if you want.
[Charlie's dad on tape] Whoo! Come on, sweetie!
Hello, Brighton Falls. This is Charlie Watson, future Olympic gold medalist. [laughs] That was so perfect.
translation.ja: 将来の金メダリスト チャーリー･ワトソンです

translation.en: -Thanks, Dad. -[Charlie's dad] How do you feel?
[Charlie] No, no, why would you play this?
Let's see if we got something.
[Charlie] You know, Bee, music can help you say what you're feeling.
translation.ja: 音楽で気持ちを表現できる

translation.en: You're gonna love this. It's brand new.
translation.ja: きっと気に入るわ　新曲よ
スティーヴィー･ニックスは？

translation.en: Hey, hey, please don't touch those. Please.
Do you want to hear it?
We used to listen to this while we'd work on the Corvette.
translation.ja: 車をいじりながら パパと聴いた

translation.en: He used to say it would make the car feel better.
We used to work on this car every weekend together.
translation.ja: 週末は この車の修理をした

translation.en: That was the last time I saw him.
He died of a heart attack.
I never got to say goodbye.
You know, I always thought if I could just...
translation.ja: それから ずっと思ってた

translation.en: If I could just get it to start up again,
translation.ja: パパがエンジンの音を⸺

translation.en: I say this with all due respect.
Have you lost your damn mind?
That was with all due respect?
[General Whalen] The man's got a point, Doctor.
Our satellite network is at the forefront of our national defense.
translation.ja: 衛星システムは国防の要だ

translation.en: [Powell] Sir, please. It could be a once in a lifetime opportunity.
translation.ja: これは一生に一度の チャンスです

translation.en: Can you imagine the advances an alliance with these creatures might bring?
translation.ja: 彼らの進んだ技術を 学べますよ

translation.en: [Agent Burns] I imagine the advances. An advance on Washington.
translation.ja: 奴らが首都を 襲ったら どうする

translation.en: -New York. An advance on Chicago! -That's not gonna happen.
translation.ja: ニューヨークやシカゴを まさか

translation.en: They literally call themselves "Decepticons." That doesn't set off any red flags?
translation.ja: “ディセプティコン”は “だます”という意味では？
もういい　よすんだ

translation.en: we're talking about the most advanced robotic system ever seen.
translation.ja: 彼らは人類が遭遇した 最も先進的なロボットです

translation.en: If we tell them no, they'll just take their technology to the Russians instead.
translation.ja: 我々が協力を拒めば ソ連と組む恐れがある

translation.en: Do you really want to go down in history as the man who cost us the Cold War?
translation.ja: “冷戦に負けた男”として 歴史に名を刻みますか？

translation.en: We'll help them find their fugitive.
translation.ja: 彼らの捜索に協力する

translation.en: And when it's done, you can do all the experiments you want. Hmm?
translation.ja: 逃亡者が見つかったら 彼らを研究材料に
こちらへどうぞ　ロボット殿

translation.en: [Dropkick] How kind of you to finally allow us in.
translation.ja: ここに入れてくれて感謝する

translation.en: We're very happy to have you here as friends.
translation.ja: 君たちを友人として迎える
ありがとう　我が友よ

translation.en: My superior has agreed to grant you limited access to our satellites.
translation.ja: 君たちが衛星に アクセスする許可が出た

translation.en: In addition, you're welcome to use all of our technology here.
translation.ja: ここのテクノロジーを 全て使って構わない

translation.en: It's the largest super-array of Crays on Earth.
translation.ja: 地球上で最大の スーパーコンピューターだ

translation.en: We thank you for your hospitality.
Tell me, those vocal communication devices you use,
translation.ja: 諸君が使用している 音声通信装置は⸺
全世界に通じているのか？
電話か そうだが なぜだ？

translation.en: You got to pick a station, man. I know there's a lot of choices.
translation.ja: 好きな局を選んで たくさんある

translation.en: "You want to go on a date with me, maybe?"
What are you trying to do?
Here we go. Here we go.
translation.ja: しっかりしろ 僕はオタクじゃない

translation.en: You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd.
translation.ja: しっかりしろ 僕はオタクじゃない オタクじゃない

translation.en: Okay, you're a nerd, but just don't let her see that you're nerdy.
Excuse me. Sorry to barge in. I just...
Just sit down, please? Shh, don't scream, okay?
translation.ja: 座って 悲鳴を上げないで

translation.en: It's okay, okay? Just breathe. Breathe.
Look, I know what you saw was a little crazy. I can explain.
translation.ja: 驚いただろうけど説明する

translation.en: Yeah, I can't explain. But here's the deal. If you tell anyone what you just saw, I'm gonna have to run you over with my car.
translation.ja: やっぱ説明できない 誰かに話したら車で轢くわ

translation.en: That was... I don't mean that in a mean way.
Okay? What I'm saying is no one can know what you just saw, okay?
translation.ja: ここで見たことを 誰にも言うなってことよ

translation.en: Bumblebee, you can... you can come out now.
translation.ja: バンブルビー　姿を現して

translation.en: He's been going up and down on that dial all day today and I don't know why.
translation.ja: ラジオの局を やたらに替えてる

translation.en: You mean the shirt that I'm wearing?
Yes, yes! Come on. I'll give it back to you.
Come on! Give me your shirt!
Wait, wait, wait! Hey, no, no! You don't need to do this.
translation.ja: そんなことしなくても…

translation.en: -Come here. Come on! -No, I get it. I get it!
translation.ja: 立って！ よく分かったから…

translation.en: I know I promised you, but, yeah, you're not getting that back.
translation.ja: 返せなくなっちゃった
我々のテクノロジーを １つに結合し⸺
衛星と電話と⸺ コンピューターによる 相互作用の情報の網を作った

translation.en: They're creating an interconnected web of information.
translation.ja: コンピューターによる 相互作用の情報の網を作った

translation.en: Volumes of data at their fingertips. It's revolutionary.
translation.ja: 大量のデータを処理できる 革命的だ

translation.en: He's a weird guy. You ever notice that about Powell?
[Dr. Powell] They're tracking fluctuations in Energon levels.
translation.ja: 彼らが追跡しているのは エネルゴンの変動

translation.en: It's like a heat signature specific to their species.
translation.ja: 彼らに特有の熱反応だ

translation.en: You've given them our satellites, our comms, God knows what else.
translation.ja: 衛星と通信システムを 使わせたら次は？

translation.en: Yet, in the space of a day they've given us a way
translation.ja: しかし彼らのおかげで 捕獲できるぞ

translation.en: to not only hunt down B-127, but all of them.
translation.ja: Ｂ-127だけでなく 彼ら全員を

translation.en: Let them finish what they're doing. Let them find B-127.
translation.ja: 彼らには Ｂ-127を見つけさせよう

translation.en: And then I'll give you permission to destroy them all.
translation.ja: その後 彼らを破壊してよい

translation.en: [Memo] So you have no idea where he came from?
translation.ja: ビーは どこから来た？

translation.en: You thought about calling the cops?
What are they gonna do, Memo?
translation.ja: 通報したら どうなると思う？

translation.en: They're just gonna send him away to a lab and do weird science experiments on him.
translation.ja: ラボに送られ 変な実験の材料になる

translation.en: ♪ Plastic tubes and pots and pans... ♪
translation.ja: プラスチックのチューブに 　　　　　　　　　つながれて

translation.en: [chuckles] You're getting pretty good with that radio dial, Bee.
translation.ja: 選局がうまくなったね

translation.en: Yeah, D.J. Bumble in the house! [whoops]
♪ I can't live without my radio ♪
translation.ja: ラジオなしじゃ 　　　生きられない

translation.en: Is that why you're always messing with the dial?
[gasps] You're trying to teach yourself how to talk, aren't you?
♪ Walk like a man Talk like a man... ♪
translation.ja: 人のように歩き 　　人のように話す
人のように歩き 　　人のように話す ウソだろ

translation.en: Oh, my God, Bee, you're a genius! You're an actual genius! ♪ Hit it! ♪
translation.ja: ビー　あなた本物の天才だよ

translation.en: -What is going on here? -[Memo] That's Jim from sixth period.
translation.ja: これ何？ 同じクラスのジムだ 今週は忙しいって…

translation.en: [chuckles] He said he was busy this week.
translation.ja: 同じクラスのジムだ 今週は忙しいって…

translation.en: You want to check it out?
Bee, we'll be right back. Don't do anything crazy.
translation.ja: ビー　すぐ戻るから いい子でね

translation.en: [man 1] Hey, everybody, come watch! Tripp's gonna jump!
translation.ja: トリップが飛び込むぞ

translation.en: -[woman 1] You're off your nut. -What's going on over there?
translation.ja: トリップが飛び込むぞ 何だろう？

translation.en: [Tripp] Come on, it's not that big a jump.
I mean, yeah. I spilled a gallon of lemonade on him once.
translation.ja: レモネードを かけたことがある

translation.en: Doesn't anyone have the balls to jump off this thing with me?
translation.ja: 俺と一緒に飛び込む奴は？

translation.en: [stammering] Yeah, I-- See, I didn't-- I didn't do that. I didn't actually--
Uh... No, sorry about that. It...
You were on the dive team with my little sister. I saw you win state a couple years ago.
translation.ja: 飛び込み選手だな 州大会で優勝した

translation.en: This just got a whole lot more interesting. We have a championship high-diver on our hands!
translation.ja: 面白くなったぞ 高飛び込みの優勝選手だ

translation.en: Yeah, I actually, I don't, I don't... I don't do it anymore.
translation.ja: もう飛び込みは やめたの

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. I won't make you go first.
Dive Girl! You better not back out on me.
translation.ja: 飛び込め 俺だけにやらせるな

translation.en: [man] You guys, she's gonna do it! She's gonna do it!
translation.ja: みんな見ろよ 彼女が飛ぶぞ！
飛び込め　飛び込め

translation.en: [Charlie's dad] You got this, Charlie girl!
-[man 1] Where you going? -[woman 1] What, are you scared?
What happened out there? -That was your big moment to look cool. -[women laugh]
translation.ja: どうしたの？ いいとこ見せるチャンスよ

translation.en: It's in the garbage, Einstein. You throw them away after each use. For sanitary purposes, obviously, but...
translation.ja: 使ったら捨てるんだ もちろん衛生のためにね

translation.en: You should have your dad buy you a better one.
translation.ja: パパに いいのを 買ってもらえば？

translation.en: But I think I know something that'll make you feel better.
translation.ja: 気分を晴らしたいなら…

translation.en: What about you, Bee? Want some revenge?
translation.ja: ビー　仕返ししたくない？

translation.en: Come on. I got an idea.

translation.ja: これはトイレット･ペーパー

translation.en: You use it for when you...

translation.ja: 違うよ　そうじゃない

translation.en: Okay, look, Bee, you be our egg man.
translation.ja: よし ビーは卵の担当にしよう
よし ビーは卵の担当にしよう それがいい

translation.en: You grab one of these, like so.
And that right there, that's your target. That's right.
[Charlie] I think we could just hand it to him...

translation.ja: さっきのはサイコーだった！

translation.en: My heart right now is going crazy.
translation.ja: 心臓がバクバクいってる

translation.en: Bee, what are you doing? What are you doing?
translation.ja: ダメだよ　ビー 何してるの？
俺は制限速度じゃ 　　　　　走れない！

translation.en: Oh, my God, we're committing a felony!
We got a yellow vehicle driving its damn self through the Pico Tunnel.
translation.ja: 黄色い車が ピコ･トンネルを暴走中

translation.en: Morning, buddy. I got to go to work, okay?
translation.ja: おはよう 私はバイトに行く

translation.en: Bee. Listen to me. You need to stay in this garage, okay?
After what happened last night, I'm pretty sure the cops are looking for you,
translation.ja: 昨夜の一件で 警察が あなたを追ってる

translation.en: and, uh, you don't exactly blend in.
translation.ja: 昨夜の一件で 警察が あなたを追ってる あなたは目立つから

translation.en: I need you to go to the frozen banana stand and steal some sticks.
translation.ja: 冷凍バナナの売店から 串を盗んできてくれ

translation.en: Can't we just sell the hot dogs without the sticks?
We got a hit, I think. Where's that location?
Near San Francisco. A coastal town named Brighton Falls.
translation.ja: サンフランシスコ近郊の ブライトン･フォールズ
チャーリー　メモだ

translation.en: You got to come home right now.
It's bad. It's really, really bad.

translation.ja: バンブルビー なんてことしたの 何 考えてるのよ
なんてことしたの 何 考えてるのよ

translation.en: I told you to hide in the garage!
translation.ja: ガレージにいろって 言ったのに
あなたも恥を感じるのね
怒ってないよ　私が悪い
怒ってないよ　私が悪い あなたを置いてったから

translation.en: I never should have left you.
translation.ja: あなたを置いてったから

translation.en: [Memo] Hey, okay, maybe don't transform all the way? We've still got to get you through the door.
translation.ja: 完全に変身しない方がいい ドアを通れないぞ

translation.en: And now you're crippled for life.
translation.ja: お前は もうおしまいだ

translation.en: [Charlie] I'm sorry. This is all my fault.
translation.ja: ごめん　私のせいよ

translation.en: What'd you do to my TV?
Look, Mom, I can explain. We will talk about this later, all right?
translation.ja: 後で説明するけど 今は出かけないと

translation.en: -Now, I have to go. -Are you kidding me?
translation.ja: 後で説明するけど 今は出かけないと 出かける？

translation.en: It's about my car. It's really important.
That you spend all day and night shut in that garage, doing God-knows-what with?
translation.ja: 一日中 ガレージにこもり いじってる車？

translation.en: Mom, I can't. I really can't right now.
Oh, no, you really can, Charlie.
translation.ja: 後でじゃダメよ　チャーリー

translation.en: I have had it! Your attitude, your always sulking around.
translation.ja: あなたの すねた態度には うんざりよ

translation.en: You brought home that piece of crap without even asking me!
translation.ja: しかも勝手に ガラクタを持ちこんで

translation.en: Everyone in this family is trying to be happy,
translation.ja: 家族で幸せに 暮らしたいのに⸺

translation.en: and all you want to do is make things harder.
translation.ja: あなたは それを妨げてる

translation.en: You know, Mom, just because you've moved on and you're happy with your new life doesn't mean I have!
translation.ja: ママが新しい人生に 満足してても私は違う

translation.en: You've found a replacement for my dad and I haven't, okay, and I never will!
translation.ja: 私はパパの代わりを 見つける気はない

translation.en: So, I'm sorry if that makes things harder, but in ten months from now
translation.ja: 幸せを妨げて悪いけど 今から10ヵ月したら⸺

translation.en: you won't even have to deal with me!
I just feel like ever since my dad died, I've become this drain on everyone, and I hate it.
translation.ja: パパが死んでから私は 嫌な人間になってる

translation.en: It's like everybody expects me to act like nothing ever happened, and... it's impossible to do that.
translation.ja: でも みんなのように パパの死を忘れるのは無理よ

translation.en: About your dad... I'm really sorry.
translation.ja: お父さんのことは気の毒に

translation.en: You know, there's... there's this quote that I like.
translation.ja: 僕が好きな言葉がある

translation.en: "The darkest nights produce the brightest stars."
translation.ja: “夜空が暗いほど 星は明るく輝く”

translation.en: My mom got it from Weight Watchers.
translation.ja: ダイエットの宣伝コピー

translation.en: Get out and move away from the vehicle.
translation.ja: 外に出て 車から離れろ

translation.en: No, don't run. Do not run!
Please tell me they're on our side.
[Shatter] No more running. No more hiding.
translation.ja: もう逃げも隠れもできないぞ

translation.en: B-127, you're a traitor and a coward.
translation.ja: Ｂ-127 お前は臆病な裏切り者だ

translation.en: Tell us where Optimus Prime is hiding.
translation.ja: オプティマスの居場所は？

translation.en: [Agent Burns] Your daughter stole government property, Mrs. Watson.
translation.ja: 彼女は 政府の所有物を盗んだ

translation.en: [Sally] She's been having trouble adjusting, but we had no idea it was this serious.
translation.ja: あの子は最近 悩んでたけど そこまで深刻だとは…

translation.en: I didn't steal anything, and he doesn't belong to them.
translation.ja: 彼は政府のものじゃない
“彼”？ はっきり言っておくが “あれ”は⸺

translation.en: I can assure you that it is an "it".
translation.ja: はっきり言っておくが “あれ”は⸺

translation.en: And "it" is a highly dangerous war machine.
No, he isn't, okay, Mom? He's not some "war machine."
translation.ja: 違うわ 戦争マシンじゃない

translation.en: I-- I don't know what he is, but... He's my friend.
translation.ja: 正体は分からないけど 私の友達よ

translation.en: Ma'am, your daughter's had a traumatic experience today. Maybe doesn't understand everything she's seen.
translation.ja: 娘さんは今日の出来事に 精神的ショックを受け⸺

translation.en: No, I'm fine, Mom. I'm completely fine, okay?
You have to believe me, please. I didn't steal anything!
translation.ja: 信じて　何も盗んでない

translation.en: Stop! Just go to your room.
translation.ja: やめて　部屋に行って

translation.en: When I was going through puberty,
-Stole a box of Mallomars once. -Yeah, we know.
translation.ja: 一度 チョコを… 知ってる

translation.en: Look, Otis, you need to go home and...
translation.ja: オーティス　やめて

translation.en: No, Otis, stop it! -Why would you do that? -[grunting]
Let go of me! -You're touching my buttocks! -[shushes]
translation.ja: 僕の お尻に触らないで！

translation.en: I will tell you a secret if you shut up.
translation.ja: 黙ったら秘密を教える

translation.en: Okay, so, um, this is my room.
translation.ja: 入って　ここが僕の部屋 ゆっくりして これは姉さんのだ

translation.en: Just make yourself at home. These are actually my sister's stuff.
translation.ja: ゆっくりして これは姉さんのだ

translation.en: She likes playing pranks, like putting her stuff over here.
translation.ja: いたずら好きで 僕の部屋に…

translation.en: -[Charlie] Can I, uh, sit down? -Yeah, yeah. Mmm-hmm.
[reporter on TV] Residents of Brighton Falls have been witness to an unusual sight this evening.
translation.ja: ブライトン･フォールズで ただならぬ事態が

translation.en: Armed Forces pouring into town as part of what we are told is a routine military exercise
translation.ja: 武装した軍が演習の名目で 町に押し寄せたのです

translation.en: setting up camp at our own McKinnon Air Base.
translation.ja: マッキノン空軍基地では…

translation.en: If Bumblebee's still alive, that's where they're keeping him.
translation.ja: バンブルビーは あそこよ

translation.en: We have to go. We have to try and save him.
Count me in. I'll take point.
-But I can help. Master Larry says I-- -I need someone here.
translation.ja: 僕は強いよ 家にいて

translation.en: I need someone reliable to make sure that Mom and Ron don't know that I'm gone.
translation.ja: 頼れる人が ママの気を引かないと

translation.en: [Shatter] Tell us where Optimus Prime and the rebels are hiding,
translation.ja: オプティマスたちの 居場所を言え

translation.en: and we can end this war.
translation.ja: そうすれば戦争は終わる

translation.en: [Shatter] This doesn't concern you, human Powell.
translation.ja: それは人間に関係ない

translation.en: [Memo] Are you sure this is a good idea?
translation.ja: 本当にやるの？ 本当にやるの？ “危険　高電圧” “危険　高電圧”

translation.en: [Charlie] It's a terrible idea, but I've got to try it.
translation.ja: 危険だけど やってみる

translation.en: [Memo] You can't get-- Well, why don't you-- Stop, stop, wait...
-How'd you know the power was off? -[Charlie] I didn't. Let's go.
translation.ja: 電源がオフだと？ 知らなかった
記憶セルが焼き切れてる

translation.en: [Optimus] We will fight on. Regroup, rebuild, and retake our home.
translation.ja: 我々は戦い続け 合流し故郷を取り戻す

translation.en: But we must find refuge first.
You will travel to Earth. Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
translation.ja: お前は地球に向かえ 我々は後から行く

translation.en: If the Decepticons find it, then our people are truly finished.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンに見つかれば 我々は滅びる

translation.en: This is our chance to wipe out the Autobot resistance for good.
translation.ja: オートボット反乱軍を 全滅させるチャンスだ

translation.en: We'll burn the whole planet to cinders.
translation.ja: この星を灰にしてやる

translation.en: [Shatter] We must get word to Cybertron immediately.
translation.ja: サイバトロンに連絡する

translation.en: Tell them to bring an army.
[softly] Burns, we made a terrible mistake.
And thanks to our human allies,
I know just how to get the message home.
translation.ja: 故郷にメッセージを送れる

translation.en: Thank you for your hospitality, friend Powell.
translation.ja: ご厚意に感謝する 我が友パウエルよ

translation.en: -[Dr. Powell] You have to stop them! -Powell!
What, did she cut the wire to the TV?
translation.ja: テレビのケーブルが 切れてる？
オープンリールは使える

translation.en: Charlie's fallen ill and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.ja: 発病したため安静が必要

translation.en: She wishes not to be troubled. Keep clear of her chambers.
translation.ja: 部屋への接近は禁止です

translation.en: and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.ja: 安静が必要だから 部屋への接近は…
安静が必要だから 部屋への接近は… オーティス クスリやってるの？
オーティス クスリやってるの？
ダメだってば　ママ
ダメだってば　ママ チャーリー

translation.en: -Mom, there is no reason to go... -Where is she?
[Shatter] I found a tower to transmit our message.
Talk to me, Bee, talk to me.
I can fix this. I can fix this.
translation.ja: 私が修理する　できるわ

translation.en: You got to wake up, Bee. You got to wake up.
translation.ja: 起きてちょうだい　ビー

translation.en: Come on, Bee. Come back to me.
Come on, give me the other one.
I can't lose you, too, Bee.
Come on, Bee, we've got to get you out of here.
[Memo] Charlie, there's like a million guys out there!
translation.ja: チャーリー　外に大勢いる

translation.en: Come on, Bee, you've gotta get up. Can you get up?
translation.ja: ビー　立ち上がって

translation.en: There's a door in my way.
-We got to go. -[Charlie] Bee, come on.
You've gotta get up, come on.
Hold your fire! Get the kid out of here.
translation.ja: 撃つな　例の娘がいる

translation.en: -Let go of me! -You need to get away from that thing.
translation.ja: 放して あれから離れろ

translation.en: [Agent Burns] Contain it and dismantle it! Strip it down to parts!
translation.ja: 捕獲して バラバラに分解するんだ

translation.en: [Charlie] Leave him alone! You don't understand.

translation.ja: ビー！ あれは機械だ

translation.en: He's more human than you'll ever be!
translation.ja: あなたより人間らしい

translation.en: We need to get out of here.
We've got to get you someplace safe.
Bee, stop. They will kill you!
[Optimus] If the Decepticons find Earth, then our people are truly finished.
translation.ja: ディセプティコンに見つかれば 我々は滅びる

translation.en: Go on. I'll buy you some time with these guys.
We should really look into getting seatbelts.
Oh, my God, oh, my God.
It's okay. She's gonna steal the robot back, fight off the police, kill two bigger robots, and come right back home.
translation.ja: お姉ちゃんは 悪者ロボットを倒して帰るよ

translation.en: [reporter on radio] Folks, this just breaking. There appears to be a high-speed chase underway just outside McKinnon Air Base.
translation.ja: マッキノン空軍基地の近くで カーチェイスが展開中

translation.en: You lose that car, I will personally rip your face off.
translation.ja: 逃げられたら承知しないぞ

translation.en: You pull that car over right this second.
This is very unsafe, what you're doing.
Mom, you got to get out of here, okay?
[Charlie] Mom... You have to trust me, please!
-We got to help her, Ron! -Hang on.
translation.ja: 助けないと つかまれ！

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! What are you doing?
I saw this on Miami Vice.
-Oh. Oh. I got it, I got it, I got it. -Oh, my God!
Ron! We have a kid in the car!
I was trying to save the other kid! What was I--
Otis? Otis, are you all right?
translation.ja: オーティス　大丈夫？

translation.en: Preparing satellites to transmit our message.
I hate this plan. Bee, I want to help.
translation.ja: イヤよ　私も力になる

translation.en: ♪ I would hate anything To happen to her ♪
translation.ja: 彼女に何かあったら 　　　　　僕は困るんだ

translation.en: And you're listening to The Smiths.
Handle him! And finish the job this time!
translation.ja: 今度こそ息の根を止めろ

translation.en: How the hell am I gonna get up there?
There. The one on the tower.
You think these little chains can hold...
You need to get outta here.
I mean my friends are coming. And they're gonna be looking for him.
translation.ja: 俺の仲間が 彼を捕らえに来る

translation.en: Hey, can you call my mom?
Bee, I can't go with you.
You've got people out there that need you.
translation.ja: 仲間が あなたを待ってる

translation.en: [woman on radio] So much... [man 2 on radio] For giving me... [man 3 on radio] My voice.
translation.ja: 君のおかげで 声が手に入った

translation.en: for making me feel like me again.

translation.ja: さよなら　バンブルビー

translation.en: Are you telling me you could've been a Camaro this whole time?
translation.ja: 初めからカマロになれたの？
絶対だよ 僕のことを忘れないで
僕のことを忘れないで “鏡に映るものは 実は近くにある”

translation.en: Well, I've taken a few notes.
I couldn't have done it without you guys.
Wow, um, what happened to you today?
translation.ja: 今日 何があったの？

translation.en: Oh, you know, robot fights, high-speed chases, international disasters.
translation.ja: ロボットの死闘 カーチェイス　世界の危機
まだ早い そっか　分かった

translation.en: [Optimus] Old friend, you kept this planet safe.
translation.ja: 友よ お前は この星を守った

translation.en: Because of you, we have a future, B-127.
translation.ja: おかげで我々は 未来が持てるんだ Ｂ-127

translation.en: [Charlie] Let's see if we got something.
